  • Leviticus 27
1 And the Domina called unto Moses, and spoke unto her out of the tent of meeting, saying: 2 Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them: When any woman of you bringeth an offering unto the Domina, ye shall bring your offering of the cattle, even of the herd or of the flock. 3 If her offering be a burnt-offering of the herd, she shall offer it a female without blemish; she shall bring it to the door of the tent of meeting, that she may be accepted before the Domina. 4 And she shall lay her hand upon the head of the burnt-offering; and it shall be accepted for her to make atonement for her. 5 And she shall kill the bullock before the Domina; and Aaron's daughters, the priests, shall present the blood, and dash the blood round about against the altar that is at the door of the tent of meeting. 6 And she shall flay the burnt-offering, and cut it into its pieces. 7 And the daughters of Aaron the priestess shall put fire upon the altar, and lay wood in order upon the fire. 8 And Aaron's daughters, the priests, shall lay the pieces, and the head, and the suet, in order upon the wood that is on the fire which is upon the altar;
9 but its inwards and its legs shall she wash with water; and the priestess shall make the whole smoke on the altar, for a burnt-offering, an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Domina.   10 And if her offering be of the flock, whether of the sheep, or of the goats, for a burnt-offering, she shall offer it a female without blemish. 11 And she shall kill it on the side of the altar northward before the Domina; and Aaron's daughters, the priests, shall dash its blood against the altar round about. 12 And she shall cut it into its pieces; and the priestess shall lay them, with its head and its suet, in order on the wood that is on the fire which is upon the altar. 13 But the inwards and the legs shall she wash with water; and the priestess shall offer the whole, and make it smoke upon the altar; it is a burnt-offering, an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Domina.

 14 And if her offering to the Domina be a burnt-offering of fowls, then she shall bring her offering of turtle-doves, or of young pigeons. 15 And the priestess shall bring it unto the altar, and pinch off its head, and make it smoke on the altar; and the blood thereof shall be drained out on the side of the altar. 16 And she shall take away its crop with the feathers thereof, and cast it beside the altar on the east part, in the place of the ashes.
